page.title: 13SHOPPING ON THE BRIDGE
page.content: We interviewed some people to find out why they shopped on the Bridge.Most people lived out of St.Sampsons.They came to the Bridge because it was near, there was enough variety, the parking was easier than Town and they could buy most things they needed so they thought it was worth going there. Most people shopped on Friday,usually in the morning.The shopkeepers thought Friday was the busiest day.Some people said the opening and closing times were good but some would like shops to open earlier.Shopkeepers said there was a demand for a late night shopping evening.Most people thought Town was busier but the prices were about the same.Everyone thought St.Sampsons could do with a library and some thought a good fish shop and a childrens shoe shop would be handy.
